name: Pom' Dolphin
description:
In the rustic state of Louisiana lives a happy dolphin named Pom Dolphin. He devoted his life to eat shrimps, to play with his friends and to explore the various lakes of his hometown. He's carefree, adventurous and has nothing to worry about himself at all.  But one day a terrible boat accident happened right in a middle of a dangerous bayou infested by crocodiles and water mines. Hearing nothing but his courage, he swam as fast as he could to help potential new friends to play with.

Score the best before the timer ends, the more people you bring to the boat the more points you  get.  The more people you carry the slower you are.
Be careful mines will make you loose 5 secondes.
Crocodile will make you loose 20% of the humans you're carrying.

Keys:

A / D : Left/ Right
W or Left clck : Move foward
